trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the confirmation handler of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />의 확인 처리기를 명시적으로 호출하는 데 사용되는 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> class.

Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 작업에 대한 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" />이 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> activity.

When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity explicitly invokes the confirmation handler of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A>의 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>을 지정하면 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> 작업은 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>을 반환하는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>의 확인 처리기를 명시적으로 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity executes the default confirmation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A>의 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>을 지정하지 않으면 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> 작업은 모든 자식 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> 작업에 대한 기본 확인을 성공적으로 완료한 경우의 역순으로 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>이 이전에 확인 또는 보정된 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A>를 참조하는 경우 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>이 throw됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
